localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: Think “Cards Against Humanity” meets Microsoft Paint. Now add an AI as the judge. Paint.wtf challenges you to draw your best on zany prompts and then be scored by an AI. See if you can rank atop the global leaderboard. A new prompt is released every 2 hours!
blogPost.body: Think “Cards Against Humanity” meets Microsoft Paint. Now add an AI as the judge. Paint.wtf challenges you to draw your best on zany prompts and then be scored by an AI. See if you can rank atop the global leaderboard. A new prompt is released every 2 hours!
blogPost.title: paint.wtf - A drawing game where an AI is the judge
blogPost.author: Brad Dwyer

localize.description: 想想 "纸牌反人类 "与微软绘画的结合。现在添加一个AI作为裁判。Paint.wtf 挑战你在滑稽的提示上画出你最好的作品，然后由人工智能打分。看看你是否能在全球排行榜上名列前茅。每2小时发布一次新的提示!
localize.tagline: 一个人工智能作为裁判的绘画游戏

localize.description: 想想 "紙牌反人類 "與微軟繪畫的結合。現在添加一個AI作爲裁判。Paint.wtf 挑戰你在滑稽的提示上畫出你最好的作品，然後由人工智能打分。看看你是否能在全球排行榜上名列前茅。每2小時發佈一次新的提示!
localize.tagline: 一個人工智能作爲裁判的繪畫遊戲

previous.excerpt: Remote usability testing tool that supports both qualitative and quantitative research. Eye tracking, emotion recognition, heatmaps, replays, interactive polls, live sessions and much more by simply sharing a link.
previous.title: Mupixa 2.0 - Remote usability testing, eye tracking, heatmaps, replays

localize.description: 远程可用性测试工具，支持定性和定量研究。只需分享一个链接，就能实现眼球跟踪、情感识别、热图、重播、互动投票、实时会话等功能。
localize.tagline: 远程可用性测试、眼动跟踪、热图、重播。

localize.description: 遠程可用性測試工具，支持定性和定量研究。只需分享一個鏈接，就能實現眼球跟蹤、情感識別、熱圖、重播、互動投票、實時會話等功能。
localize.tagline: 遠程可用性測試、眼動跟蹤、熱圖、重播。

next.excerpt: Back-to-back video calls stressing you out? Give yourself (and everyone else attending your next meeting) a chance to pause by adding a 2min guided audio meditation before entering the call. Works with whatever video software you use.
next.title: Mindful Meetings - Add a 2min guided meditation to any video link

localize.description: 连续的视频电话让你压力山大？在进入通话前加入2分钟的引导式音频冥想，给自己（以及参加下次会议的所有人）一个暂停的机会。无论您使用什么视频软件，都可以使用。
localize.tagline: 在任何视频链接中添加一个2分钟的冥想引导。

localize.description: 連續的視頻電話讓你壓力山大？在進入通話前加入2分鐘的引導式音頻冥想，給自己（以及參加下次會議的所有人）一個暫停的機會。無論您使用什麼視頻軟件，都可以使用。
localize.tagline: 在任何視頻鏈接中添加一個2分鐘的冥想引導。
